messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Fuchi
messages.msgSnippet: Likely late Edo Waki-Goto from what I can see in the scans.  Better to look at it in person at the Tampa show. Jim Would anyone of the group have any ideas on
messages.messageBody:
Likely late Edo Waki-Goto from what I can see in the scans. Better to look at it in person at the Tampa show.

Jim



Would anyone of the group have any ideas on the maker/school of this
piece? (please see Pete Klein photos) It's a shakudo fuchi and has fine
nanako and detail. Thanks much!



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
